overview: Sam is a parolee who has paid for his dirty deeds. Now determined to go straight and help take care of his hot headed brother and devoted sister, he becomes set upon by both the law, represented by Federal Marshall Rocky Lane, and by his former outlaw buddies led by the notorious William Oakes.
tagline: HERE IT IS...LANE'S BIGGEST...HIS BEST...A NEW THRILL-LOADED ADVENTURE WITH THE ACCENT ON ACTION!
title: Savage Frontier
